H0.text: The borders of which European country, that were set under the reign of Afonso III (1248 to 1279), are the same today. Portugal

H1.text: The borders of which European country, that were set under the reign of Afonso III (1248 to 1279), are the same today. Denmark

H2.text: The borders of which European country, that were set under the reign of Afonso III (1248 to 1279), are the same today. Albania

H3.text: The borders of which European country, that were set under the reign of Afonso III (1248 to 1279), are the same today. Potiti

A4.text: Portugal's territorial borders have remained the same.
